alert.note: Alert for Marion (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:10AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches, sleet accumulations up to one half of an inch, and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Missouri, Marion MO County. In Illinois, Adams IL and Brown IL Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
